title: Lot of 15 graded Old Judges for sale

posts.post_title: Lot of 15 graded Old Judges for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Bland
These cards were purchased with a focus on image quality and most present far better than the assigned grade. They are for sale as a lot only at this time. Price is $4000. scans are available at www.imageevent.com/crb972

Maul SGC 20 
Richardson SGC 40 
West SGC 40
Rehse SGC 30
Carney SGC 30
Schildknecht SGC 40
Robinson SGC 20
Fuller SGC 30
Darling GAI 2
Dealey SGC 50
Carroll GAI 5
Alexander SGC 30
Loftus MGR GAI 1.5
Sullivan SGC 20
Brosnan vg appearance, possibly rebacked

Please email to confirm or if you have any questions.

Thanks,

Chris

posts.post_content:
